title: push payment types
extract: Payment is made as a credit transfer (push payment) from the consumer's financial institution to the merchant, as opposed to a debit transfer (pull payment). Payment is made directly from the consumer's account rather than through a third-party account.
extract_html: Payment is made as a credit transfer (push payment) from the consumer's financial institution to the merchant, as opposed to a debit transfer (pull payment). Payment is made directly from the consumer's account rather than through a third-party account.
